opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Clingman, Secretary, Oklahoma State Election Board v. Beaver

opinion:
543 U.S. 1041

CLINGMAN, SECRETARY, OKLAHOMA STATE ELECTION BOARD, ET AL.
v.
BEAVER ET AL.

No. 04-37.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 7, 2005.

1

C. A. 10th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 542 U. S. 965.] Motion of South Dakota et al. for leave to participate in oral argument as amici curiae and for divided argument granted.
